verses.name: Luke 6:31
verses.text: And as ye would that men should do to you, do ye also to them likewise.

verses.name: Luke 6:32
verses.text: For if ye love them which love you, what thank have ye? for sinners also love those that love them.

verses.name: Luke 6:33
verses.text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you, what thank have ye? for sinners also do even the same.

verses.name: Luke 6:34
verses.text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive, what thank have ye? for sinners also lend to sinners, to receive as much again.
